00024 #ifndef __L4SYS__KERNEL_OBJECT_H__
00025 #define __L4SYS__KERNEL_OBJECT_H__
00026 
00027 #include <l4/sys/types.h>
00028 #include <l4/sys/compiler.h>
00029 #include <l4/sys/utcb.h>
00030 
00051 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00052 l4_invoke_debugger(l4_cap_idx_t obj, l4_msgtag_t tag, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW;
00053 
00054 
00055 /**************************************************************************
00056  * Implementation
00057  **************************************************************************/
00058 
00059 #include <l4/sys/__kernel_object_impl.h>
00060 #include <l4/sys/ipc.h>
00061 
00062 enum L4_kobject_op {
00063   L4_KOBJECT_OP_DEC_REFCNT = 0,
00064   L4_KOBJECT_OP_REGISTER_IRQ,
00065 };
00066 
00067 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00068 l4_kobject_dec_refcnt_u(l4_cap_idx_t obj, l4_mword_t diff, l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW;
00069 
00070 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00071 l4_kobject_dec_refcnt(l4_cap_idx_t obj, l4_mword_t diff) L4_NOTHROW;
00072 
00073 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00074 l4_kobject_dec_refcnt_u(l4_cap_idx_t obj, l4_mword_t diff, l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00075 {
00076   l4_msg_regs_t *m = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00077   m->mr[0] = L4_KOBJECT_OP_DEC_REFCNT;
00078   m->mr[1] = diff;
00079   return l4_ipc_call(obj, u, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_KOBJECT, 2, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00080 }
00081 
00082 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00083 l4_kobject_dec_refcnt(l4_cap_idx_t obj, l4_mword_t diff) L4_NOTHROW
00084 {
00085   return l4_kobject_dec_refcnt_u(obj, diff, l4_utcb());
00086 }
00087 
00088 #endif /* ! __L4SYS__KERNEL_OBJECT_H__ */
